Uid Component
=============

The UID component provides an object-oriented API to generate and represent UIDs.

<<<<<<< HEAD
It provides implementations that work on 32-bit and 64-bit CPUs
for ULIDs and for UUIDs version 1 and versions 3 to 8.

=======
